abilityEffect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may return a Pokémon Tool or Technical Machine card attached to your Pokémon to your hand. This power can't be used if Mismagius GL is affected by a Special Condition.

effect.en: Count the number of cards in your hand. Put that many damage counters on the Defending Pokémon. You can't put more than 8 damage counters in this way.
